name: enigma-uikit
description: Intuitive, accessible solutions for common UI needs in React.

scripts.site:css:release: npm run site:css && mv site/public/style.css site/public/assets/style.css
scripts.site:js:release: NODE_ENV=production browserify site/index.js -t babelify -t [ brfs --transformer site/prepare.js ] | uglifyjs -mc drop_console --screw-ie8 > site/public/assets/bundle.min.js
scripts.site:js:watch: budo site/index.js:public/bundle.js -d site -H 0.0.0.0 --colors --live --open --pushstate --iw -- -t babelify -t [ brfs --transformer site/prepare.js ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin
scripts.site:release: npm run site:css:release && npm run site:js:release && sed -e 's/bundle.js/bundle.min.js/g' -e 's/public/assets/g' < site/index.html > site/public/index.html
scripts.start: sh parallelize.sh "npm run site:css:watch" "npm run site:js:watch"
scripts.js: browserify exports.js -t babelify -t [ exposify --expose [ --react React --react-dom ReactDOM ] ] $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) -p bundle-collapser/plugin --debug -o public/uikit.js
scripts.js:release: NODE_ENV=production browserify exports.js -t babelify -t [ exposify --expose [ --react React --react-dom ReactDOM ] ] $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs -mc drop_console --screw-ie8 > public/uikit.min.js
scripts.all: npm run css && npm run css:release && npm run es5 && npm run js && npm run js:release
